document.full_text: on friday, the brotherhood of silence will include for the first time 26 women in one of the traditional processions that have put seville, spain, at center stage during holy week.
document.title: female factor: a spanish brotherhood includes women in holy week procession
lines_and_colors: on friday, the brotherhood of silence will include for the first time 26 women in one of the traditional processions that have put seville, spain, at center stage during holy week.
